title: Find the line of best fit
description:
Given the following coordinates find the line of best fit:
|x|y|
|-|-|
|1|2|
|2|4|
|3|6|
|4|8|
|7|8|

Calculate to 3 significant digits. and make sure to format your answer as "y=Mx+b" with *no spaces*

title: Find the line of best fit
description:
Given the following coordinates find the line of best fit:
|x|y|
| --- |
|1|3|
|2|6|
|3|9|
|4|15|
|6|28|
Calculate to 3 significant digits. and make sure to format your answer as "y=Mx+b" with *no spaces*
